titles.title: Electing certain Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/12/2013--Passed House without amendment. Elects specified named Members to the following House Committees: Homeland Security; Judiciary; Natural Resources; Science, Space, and Technology; and Transportation and Infrastructure.
